name: Addy Bee
greetingText: I just wanted to tell you that you are beautiful. Inside and out. Now and always.
wishText: I hope you have nothing but joy and (Anup/Bhavani in your life)
text1: I have nothing but overwhelming respect for your resilience
textInChatBox: Who is the most gorgeous, most courageous, most awesome person ever?
text2: I was initially going to send you a simple text wishing you a happy birthday
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Please know that you will always be loved as long as I'm alive
outroText: I hope you never let anything dull the amazing light that you have within you
replayText: I love you so damn much
